message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a valuable asset that's worth more than that to me, but I'm willing to negotiate.
Alice, $1,200,000 is way above my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can't go higher than $850,000. Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $850,000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000.  This is a significant concession on my part, but I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product.

Alice, I understand this is a valuable product to you, but I'm still firm on my offer of $850,000.  I'm not able to go any higher. If you're not willing to accept this offer, I'll have to explore other options.
